name: Cold Email
description:
Hey,

It's one week from launch day for our new game!! Congrats to all of us!

This is the day to send out those cold emails! We don't know any press personally, but the success of the game depends on getting featured on their websites. We have a very limited remaining budget, so try to send those emails as fast as possible!

Remember this is a Jam Game by

Daniel Ponce @chiwis on twitter.

Follow @craterhouse on twitter or visit craterhouse.com for more on what Daniel and Crater House are doing!

Thanks,

@chiwis

XOXOXOX
